summary: This document contains due diligence research results on the J. Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation, Inc. conducted by PWM BIS-RESEARCH. The report indicates no significant negative media or legal issues found related to the foundation, and it includes various compliance checks and results from different databases.

keyFacts: The document is a due diligence report on the J. Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation, Inc.
No significant negative media or legal issues were found related to the foundation.
The report was prepared by Sanchit Mittal on August 20, 2018.
Paul Hoffman is noted as a prior employee of the foundation.
The foundation has been in business for 18 years with no recent public filings.
